name: Diorama No.1 : Blocked In
description: In 'Blocked In' you will visit the workspace of a Russian scientist to enjoy an extraordinary view of the end of the world by Tetronimoes, that will leave you ‘Blocked In’. ‘Blocked In’ is the first entry in 'The Shoebox Diorama' series by interactive illustrator 'Daniel Ernst'.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core I5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great title from DK1 days! Lovely to be able to get up and walk around. Recomended to anybody with a Vive.
